title: Vita Relocation Program
description:
Thousands of Vitas aren't getting the love they deserve. Let's fix that together! Make Vita great again!

Got a Vita you'd like to get to a loving home? Mail it to us!
Vita Relocation Program
PO Box 22541
San Francisco, CA 94122

Want to give a Vita a second chance at life? Sign up to adopt here: http://kindafunny.com/vitarelocationprogram

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

transcript_chunks.text: [Music] in the arms of the Angels fly away from here from this dark C hotel and the a that you fear are hi I'm Greg Miller and this is morard and we're PSI love you XOXO will you be an angel for a helpless Vita every day thousands of vas go unloved unplayed and unappreciated around the world while dozens of Gamers without the handheld are crying out for help for the price of a stamp you can help these vas have a second chance all you have to do is join the Vita relocation program if you've been neglecting your Vita send it to our PO box once we receive it we'll private message one of the candidates looking to adopt over at kind of funny.com Vita relocation program they'll send us their address and we'll mail your Vita to a new loving home for free when this inevitably becomes too much work and we stop mailing vas Greg will carry the vas with him to 2017 events like kind of funny live 3 packs or PSX and all folks looking to adopt will have to do is ask him for one again to be clear ask

and we stop mailing vas Greg will carry the vas with him to 2017 events like kind of funny live 3 packs or PSX and all folks looking to adopt will have to do is ask him for one again to be clear ask me Colin either won't be at these events or he won't want to talk to you correct please quitters just because you've given up on vaita doesn't mean a prospective member of Vita island has to do the right thing mail us your vas along with power cords memory cards you know everything you need to make it work and if you think you could provide a vaita with a loving home apply at kind of funny.com relocation program together we can make the vaita great again o yikes that is a loaded catchphrase is that what we're going with ar the Angels fly away from here
